snippet: The revisions more explicitly detail the manner in which Google software scans users’ emails, an unpopular practice that has been at the heart of litigation.
abstract: Google updates its terms of service, informing users that their emails are automatically analyzed by software to create targeted ads; unpopular practice has been at heart of litigation.
lead_paragraph: The revisions more explicitly detail the manner in which Google software scans users’ emails, an unpopular practice that has been at the heart of litigation.

headline.main: Google Revises Terms of Its Scans of Gmail
